subject: p14851532
History: Year old man with pulmonary edema, CHF, p/w sepsis shock, worsening pulmonary edema acute intra pulm/cardiac process worsening pulmonary edema acute intra pulm/cardiac process.
Impression: Mild asymmetric pulmonary edema has improved slightly since. There may be a region of consolidation at the right base which has developed over the past 24 hr. Conventional radiographs would be helpful to see if there is right lower lobe pneumonia. Region of chronic abnormality in the left upper lobe is highlighted by the edema. Mild cardiomegaly stable. Pleural effusions small if any. Right jugular line ends in the mid SVC. No pneumothorax.
